title: Vault CLI Video Content Fix - Complete Success
details:
Successfully fixed and tested vault generate-index CLI tool for video-reference content types.

PROBLEM RESOLVED:
Lesson index files were not displaying video content when videos had template-type "video-reference" instead of "video".

CHANGES IMPLEMENTED:
1. Enhanced AddLessonLevelContent method to include "video-reference" in content types array
2. Updated GetContentTypeIcon to map "video-reference" â†’ "ðŸŽ¥"
3. Updated GetContentTypeTitle to map "video-reference" â†’ "Videos"
4. Added comprehensive debug logging for file scanning and categorization

TESTING RESULTS:
âœ… All 767 tests passing (764 succeeded, 3 skipped, 0 failed)
âœ… All 30 VaultIndexContentGenerator-specific tests passing
âœ… CLI tool successfully processes 546 lesson folders
âœ… Generated index files now properly display video content:
   ## ðŸŽ¥ Videos
   - [[Application Ipo]]

QUALITY ASSURANCE:
- No breaking changes to existing functionality
- Backward compatibility maintained for "video" content types
- All existing tests continue to pass
- Code follows C# modern patterns and conventions
- Added null safety improvements

The vault generate-index CLI tool now correctly handles both "video" and "video-reference" template types in lesson-level index generation.
